channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for DE
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for DE

item.title: Report X-2023100496
item.description:
Report X-2023100496

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-08T18:14:16+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-13
  • City: SEAFORD
  • State: DE
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: the package was unloaded off a trailer with the box wet and with product leaking from the box. . put the package in a tote and brought it to QA DescribePack: upon inspection of the box found that one bottle of cleaner had a loose cap DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: put it in a tote
